title: Will New Hanover County continue the bicycle/walking path from Military Cut-off up to the Porter\'s Neck light? It would be wonderful if the residents in the northern half of the county could use this path to travel to the beach.  Currently it is way to dangerous to walk or bicycle on market street.  Thank you.
text:
